Actions.Name: Rebound
Actions.Description: The [name] pushes off an adjacent character. They shove that character 1 space, then rush 1. Collide: If their target collides with an ally, that ally may also rush 1.

Actions.Name: High Flyer
Actions.Description: The [name] balances on their pole and uses it to move, ignoring all terrain damage and movement penalties, rampart, and engagement while in this stance.

Combo.Name: Dive Kick
Combo.Description: The [name] rushes 1, ending their High Flyer stance. An adjacent foe is stunned and must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or just [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
